publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1751.2 Malcolm Chisholm: Historic Scotland and Local Authoritiesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1751) in the name of Linda Fabiani, insert at end "always ensuring that strong safeguards are maintained to protect heritage assets, that the skills required to maintain historic buildings are available and that, in protecting the historic environment, proper account is taken of disability rights and climate change objectives".
